name: Storytel
description: Fetches metadata from Storytel's public search API.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language/locale for the search (ISO language code)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 3, max: 10)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of content to search for (default: all)

comments: Titles and series information are automatically cleaned using language-specific patterns.
